thread.title: Suspect arrested in 'suicide' case of Sindh University student
thread.title_full: Suspect arrested in 'suicide' case of Sindh University student

author: none@none.com (Ali Hasan)
title: Suspect arrested in 'suicide' case of Sindh University student
text:
Police on Friday arrested a teacher in connection with the suspected suicide of University of Sindh Jamshoro student Naila Rind on Jan 1. 
The suspect is a teacher at a private school, a deputy inspector general said, according to DawnNews. 
The DIG said the two had been in touch for three months via telephone and Facebook. The teacher had allegedly promised to marry the girl but then refused to do so, after which she committed suicide. 
Upon retrieving telephone data, police found the suspect is a repeat offender who has done the same with 30 other girls, police said, adding that they also found objectionable photos in his possession.
